my father used to be a cop.

I'm not sure how I feel about the weather today

content.text: Hey there, how is your day going?
It is going well, thanks for asking! How about yours?
It is going great! I'm just getting ready for the weekend.
What are you going to do this weekend?
I'm going to watch some baseball and game shows.
That sounds fun! I'm not sure what I'm going to do this weekend, but I'm sure it will be fun.
Well, I hope you have a great time!
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to knit and crochet. It is a great way to relax and de-stress.
That is awesome! I used to crochet when I was younger, but I haven't done it in a while.
You should try it again! It is really relaxing and you can make some really cool things.
Maybe I will! I have always loved the way crocheted things look.
Well, if you ever decide to pick it back up, let me know and I can help you learn some new stitches.
